summary: A humble young man with uncommon skills from a small southern town gets caught up in high stakes golf matches between big-time gamblers until the game becomes life and death.
cast: Katherine LaNasa|Jeremy Sumpter|Jason Dohring|Christopher McDonald|Michael Nouri|Mekia Cox|Rya Kihlstedt|Jillian Murray|David Andrews|Michael Harding|David O'Donnell|Tim Ware|Kimberly Leemans|Jon Stafford|Hollie Stenson|Michael Beasley|Rochelle Aycoth|Justin Matthew Smith|Sainty Nelsen|Brian H. Scott|Nelson J. Davis|J. Teddy Garces|Addison Black|Joey Bell|Elliott Grey|Chris Rogers|Jeff Fuell|Dean Mauro|Logan Siu|Randy Grazio|Kyle Slabotsky|Noah Benjamin|Jenny Burpee|Lesley Sluzynski|Lisa Nygard-Pugh|Rosie McCormack|Travis Bottom|Kent Christian|Joshua Bays|Brian Blu|Diana Lenska|Sherri Robinson|Marlo Scheitler
title: The Squeeze
